start.intro: This will add a weather mobile card for the Weather Underground app
start.intro2: After the next weather update, the data will appear in the mobile card.
start.intro3: There is no further configuration required. Please click save to continue.

wunderground.updateFrequency_explanation: When no personal Weather Underground API key is specified, the update frequency is 90 minutes minimal.

generic.unitChange_explanation: If the units are changed, all current Insights logs will be deleted!
generic.notifications_text: Send notifications to notification center when error occur
generic.user_id_explanation: This ID can be used by the developer for anonymous bug tracking for this app

location.manualLocation_explanation: Use the fields below to specify an location for the weather data.
location.city: City (or empty when using station ID)

messages.unable_get_location: Unable to get Homey's location, please try again or specify a location manually.
messages.settings_success_tested: Settings successfully tested. Please use the save button to save your settings
messages.settings_unexpectedError: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again

speech.weatherDataNotAvailableYet: I'm sorry, weather data isn't available yet. Please try again later
speech.weatherDataNotAvailable: I'm sorry, weather data isn't available. Please try again later
speech.somethingWrong: I'm sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later
speech.rainHour: The past hour it has rained

messages.error_stop_updating: Max location detection attempts reached and one or all of the country/city fields are empty. Stopped updating weather!
messages.error_unable_getEnvironmentKey: Unable to get Inversion key from environment!
